DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate individual combined effect dark chocolate/cocoa almond lipid , lipoprotein , antioxidant defense , lipid peroxidation , phenolic acid , inflammatory status , blood pressure arterial health . It hypothesize dark chocolate/cocoa and/or almonds favorably affect lipid , lipoprotein , antioxidant , inflammatory status , blood pressure arterial health compare healthy American control diet ; however , effect great dark chocolate/cocoa almond consume together versus consumption food individually .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Polyphenolic-rich Dark Chocolate/Cocoa Almonds Cardiovascular Disease Risk Factors
DOC.criteria: Overweight obese ( BMI ≥25 , ≤40 kg/m2 ) Moderately elevate LDLC 2595th percentile NHANES : 105194 mg/dL male ; 98190 mg/dL female . Tobacco use Systolic blood pressure ≥159 mm Hg Diastolic blood pressure ≥ 99 mm Hg A history myocardial infarction , stroke , diabetes mellitus , liver disease , kidney disease , thyroid disease ( unless control med ) Blood pressure cholesterollowering medication use Refusal discontinue intake putative cholesterollowering supplement ( e.g . psyllium , fish oil , soy lecithin , niacin , fiber , flax , stanols/sterols ) Vegetarianism dietary practice inconsistent test diet Nut allergy Refusal discontinue nutritional supplement , herb , vitamin History inflammatory gastrointestinal disease
